total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells in the grid that are surrounded by 5s.
Q2: Check if the identified cells from Q1 contain the number 4.
Q3: If the cell contains the number 4, replace it with the number 2.
Q4: Apply the same rule to all cells in the grid.
